content: this is a free crochet pattern to make your own demogorgon from stranger things amigurumi demogorgon is a keychain size amigurumi 3 this is a very easy pattern ¡beginner-friendly but also very useful if you are an advanced crocheter and want to create a simple amigurumi that can accompany you everywhere d the best of all is that you can use the yarns and hooks you like to create your demogorgon d you can complete this amigu with very small skeins using the colors indicated in the pattern i hope you enjoy this free amigurumi pattern it s my first free contribution to this beautiful community and i hope to be able to do many more d meanwhile you can spread my work on social media and support me on my ravelry profile d i would love to see your finished demogorgons d share them with me on facebook and instagram 3
